name: dfareporting_targetableRemarketingLists_get
description: Gets one remarketing list by ID.

profileId.description: User profile ID associated with this request.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$block: Contains properties of a targetable remarketing list. Remarketing enables you to create lists of users who have performed specific actions on a site, then target ads to members of those lists. This resource is a read-only view of a remarketing list to be used to faciliate targeting ads to specific lists. Remarketing lists that are owned by your advertisers and those that are shared to your advertisers or account are accessible via this resource. To manage remarketing lists that are owned by your advertisers, use the RemarketingLists resource.

$ul: **accountId**: Account ID of this remarketing list. This is a read-only, auto-generated field that is only returned in GET requests.
**active**: Whether this targetable remarketing list is active.
**advertiserId**: Dimension value for the advertiser ID that owns this targetable remarketing list.
**etag**: The eTag of this response for caching purposes.
**id**: The ID associated with the value if available.
**kind**: The kind of resource this is, in this case dfareporting#dimensionValue.

**matchType**: Determines how the 'value' field is matched when filtering. If not specified, defaults to EXACT. If set to WILDCARD_EXPRESSION, '*' is allowed as a placeholder for variable length character sequences, and it can be escaped with a backslash. Note, only paid search dimensions ('dfa:paidSearch*') allow a matchType other than EXACT.
**kind**: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "dfareporting#targetableRemarketingList".
**lifeSpan**: Number of days that a user should remain in the targetable remarketing list without an impression.
**listSize**: Number of users currently in the list. This is a read-only field.
**listSource**: Product from which this targetable remarketing list was originated.
**name**: Name of the targetable remarketing list. Is no greater than 128 characters long.
**subaccountId**: Subaccount ID of this remarketing list. This is a read-only, auto-generated field that is only returned in GET requests.
